## NumberVector.matrixBuilder() method

Returns a [MatrixBuilder](./vector.matrixbuilder.md) which will build new matrices of a compatible type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
matrixBuilder(): MatrixBuilder<number, NumberVector, NumberMatrix>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`MatrixBuilder<number, NumberVector, NumberMatrix>`
